content: azra s love bunny amigurumi bunny / rabbit crochet pattern - english pattern only the pattern is written in english and using us crochet terms the pattern is straight forward and easy to follow there is lots of pictures in this pattern lots of step by step pictures and close-ups you need to know the basic crochet skill for amigurumi especially how to work in rounds or spiral some examples of stitches single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet increases and decreases materials required yarn i used medium weight 4 ply cotton yarn like yarn & colors favourite but any yarn of your choice will work i used grey/yellow white and pink yarn half skein is enough for the main color crochet hook 2 0 or any of your choice fibrefill / toy stuffing security eyes 7 mm stitch markers scissor and needle size approx 10 cm when using yarn & colors favourite and 2 0 mm crochet hook the pattern is a pdf and you will need adobe reader to open it adobe reader is free to download from the internet please note these patterns are for personal use only you may make as many items as you wish for yourself or as gifts you may sell any items you produce from this pattern in small quantities but please link back or give credit to me as the designer please do not share reproduce or sell this pattern or any pictures please respect my rights as a designer please follow my instagram account @handmade_by_halime thank you
